name: ROBOGART's Super Brush Pack! (P1 - P5) [CSP brushes, .sut files!]
name_original: ROBOGART's Super Brush Pack! (P1 - P5) [CSP brushes, .sut files!]
description:
This is a Super Pack of the first 5 brush packs (a grand total of 166 brushes)! Lots of textures and brush types for you to play around with! I hope you all have lots of fun!! ♡♡♡

Stay tuned for the next brush pack! We're approaching the next bundle of 5 fast! :3c

*Rights Use/Permissions: Any work you make with these brushes you can use personally OR commercially! The only thing you can't do is resell or redistribute these brush files themselves! Thank you so much! ♡ 

**CSP brushes are currently ONLY useable in CSP! There is no compatibility with procreate, photoshop, etc. at this time!**
